title: MySQL Check
description: A configuration for a check that uses the MySQL protocol.

host.description: The IP or hostname of the host to run the MySQL check against.

username.description: The user to log in to the MySQL server with.

password.description: The password for the user you wish to log in with.

port.description: The TCP port the MySQL server should be listening on.

database.description: The name of the database to query.

table.description: The name of the table to query.

column.description: The name of the column to query.

matchContent.description: Whether an entry in the queried column must match a defined regex for the check to pass.

contentRegex.description: A regex to be matched by an entry in the queried column.
